reviews.review_msg: Great Prof - super interesting. She is new to teaching so she is super considerate! She knows how to handle a class! She made class engaging and encouraged class discussion! Tell's you exactly what she is looking for in her papers and assignment - gives great tips! VERY FAIR MARKER - she gives you a mark you deserve!

Kanya is kind and caring. The class was online, which Kanya struggled with. The lectures were informative but incredibly short. The grading criteria were unclear. The class average was high heading into the final exam, which was clearly used to scale down the class average. The final was not difficult but lacked any criteria or feedback.

She's very well-read and up to date on current events that are relevant to her teachings. She has a very open-ended method to teaching, where she presents material and lets you run with it.. I can imagine it would be a refreshing class to take IRL but it was poorly executed online, 8/10 prof in normal circumstances, 3/10 class overall online.

Prof tended to go off on tangents. was not clear what she wanted us to learn.  would give us 5 min pop quizzes randomly to make sure we were doing the reading.  compared to my other profs, she was very hard marker giving me one grade lower on average than all my other profs.  not very approachable, can be awkward at times.  she is average prof.

She's a nice person and a fair marker. Her lectures are not very helpful with understanding security issues. She does allow a lot of academic freedom and creativity when it comes to presentations and papers.

Rob is awesome! Very well organized, extremely helpful, helps that he's not just a stuffy academic but has actually worked in the field. The best part was that he included various types of media, including some very relevant guest speakers - if only all profs put this much effort into teaching!
Rob was an awesome teacher, very organized and worked hard to make the lectures engaging.  Fair marker, I would happily take another class with him.
Was really looking forward to taking Human Security but the class was not what I had hoped for.  Very theoretical and dry.  Nice enough guy though!  He's young, I'm sure he will improve over time.
